Webinar “Technology Update: Geospatial in Pandemic Era”
=======================================================

by [webmaster](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/author/sazizul/ "Posts by webmaster")
 | Oct 8, 2021 | [Conference & Seminar](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/category/conference-seminar/)
, [News](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/category/news/)

![](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2021/10/243735719_4746259475419421_2450600030389801422_n-980x694.jpg)

[![](<Base64-Image-Removed>)](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2021/10/243682285_4746260032086032_4897941951185183083_n.jpg)
 [![](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2021/10/244650588_4746259785419390_4629064556125296988_n-300x170.jpg)](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2021/10/244650588_4746259785419390_4629064556125296988_n.jpg)
 [![](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2021/10/244476345_4746259778752724_6536656056302264037_n-300x169.jpg)](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2021/10/244476345_4746259778752724_6536656056302264037_n.jpg)
 [![](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2021/10/244713925_4746259775419391_5543000330947462600_n-300x154.jpg)](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2021/10/244713925_4746259775419391_5543000330947462600_n.jpg)

Program Geoinformasi, FABU telah melaksanakan program webinar bertajuk”Technology Update: Geospatial in Pandemic Era” bersama Politeknik Sultan Ahmad Shah (POLISAS) pada 5 Oktober 2021 yang telah disertai oleh hampir 180 staf politeknik dari seluruh malaysia dan pelajar-pelajar POLISAS.
